## Type of Change

<!-- Mark the relevant option with an [x] -->

- [ ] `feat:` New feature (minor version bump)
- [ ] `fix:` Bug fix (patch version bump)
- [ ] `docs:` Documentation changes (patch version bump)
- [ ] `refactor:` Code refactoring (patch version bump)
- [ ] `perf:` Performance improvements (patch version bump)
- [ ] `test:` Test updates (patch version bump)
- [ ] `build:` Build system changes (patch version bump)
- [ ] `ci:` CI/CD changes (patch version bump)
- [ ] `chore:` Other changes (no version bump)
- [ ] `BREAKING CHANGE:` Breaking changes (major version bump)

## Conventional Commit Format

This PR title should follow [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/):

**Format:** `type(scope): description`

**Examples:**
- `feat: add vault auto-unseal support`
- `fix(terraform): resolve repository creation issue`
- `docs: update bootstrap guide`
- `feat!: migrate to vault secrets v2` (breaking change)

## Checklist

- [ ] PR title follows conventional commit format
- [ ] Changes have been tested locally
- [ ] Documentation has been updated (if needed)
- [ ] All tests pass
